headline: Show HN: The Newsletter That Teaches Portuguese – In 5 Minutes a Day
description:
I've launched this newsletter with a focus on having interesting content to read daily, while teaching European Portuguese.

I would love to have your feedback, but you don't need to sign up to provide it. Here's a few of the previous editions you may read without registering:

The Chinese Philosopher [https://preview.mailerlite.com/y2i8p3m4g7]

Rare Means Rare [https://preview.mailerlite.com/h4g5p2b8a6]

Napping & Kids [https://preview.mailerlite.com/l3d9w6m4x8]

https://dailynata.com
